cytoscape.customplugins.biopax.view
Class Utils

java.lang.Object
  cytoscape.customplugins.biopax.view.Utils

public abstract class Utils
extends Object

Utility class containing helping methods for laying out and getting data from UI controls.

Author:
Yassen Assenov

Method Detail

adjustWidth

public static void adjustWidth(JComponent aComponent,
                               int aWidth)
Adjust the size of a component such that it has the specified preferred width.

Parameters:
aComponent - Component to be adjusted.
aWidth - Value for the preferred width of the component.

canSave

public static boolean canSave(File aFile,
                              Component aParent)
Verifies the given file does not exist and can therefore be created.

If the file exists, it will be overwritten. In such a case a confirmation dialog is displayed to the user.

Parameters:
aFile - File to be checked.
aParent - Parent component of the confirmation dialog. This parameter is used only if a confirmation dialog is displayed.
Returns:
true if the specified file does not exist, or if it exists and the user has confirmed it can be overwritten; false otherwise.

createButton

public static JButton createButton(String aText,
                                   String aTooltip,
                                   ActionListener aListener)
Creates a new button with manageable width.

Parameters:
aText - Text of the button.
aTooltip - Tooltip text for the button. Set this to null if no tooltip is to be displayed.
aListener - Button click's listener.
Returns:
Newly created instance of JButton.

createCheckBox

public static JCheckBox createCheckBox(String aText,
                                       String aToolTip,
                                       ActionListener aListener)
Creates a new checkbox with manageable width.

Parameters:
aText - Text of the checkbox.
aToolTip - Tooltip text for the checkbox. Set this to null if no tooltip is to be displayed.
aListener - Checkbox click's listener.
Returns:
Newly created instance of JCheckBox.

createLabel

public static JLabel createLabel(String aText,
                                 String aToolTip)
Creates a new text label.

Parameters:
aText - Text of the label.
aToolTip - Tooltip text of the label. Set this to null if no tooltip is to be displayed.
Returns:
Newly created instance of JLabel.

doubleToString

public static String doubleToString(double aValue,
                                    int aMaxLength,
                                    int aMaxPrecision)
Creates a String representation of a double based on the given maximum length and precision.

Parameters:
aValue - Value to find the String representation of.
aMaxLength - Maximum length, in number of characters, of the output string. Note that the length of the returned String may be greater than the number specified by this parameter.
aMaxPrecision - Maximum precision to use for the value.
Returns:
String representation of aValue.

doubleToString

public static String doubleToString(Double aValue,
                                    int aMaxLength,
                                    int aMaxPrecision)
Creates a String representation of a double based on the given maximum length and precision.

Parameters:
aValue - Value to find the String representation of.
aMaxLength - Maximum length, in number of characters, of the output string. Note that the length of the returned String may be greater than the number specified by this parameter.
aMaxPrecision - Maximum precision to use for the value.
Returns:
String representation of aValue.

ensureSize

public static void ensureSize(Dimension aCurrentSize,
                              Dimension aSize)
Enlarges, if necessary, the given current size to cover the given other size.

If both the width and height of aCurrentSize are larger than the width and height of aSize, respectively, calling this method has no effect.

Parameters:
aCurrentSize - Size to be enlarged if necessary.
aSize - Minimal required size of aCurrentSize.
Throws:
NullPointerException - If any of the given parameters is null.

equalizeSize

public static void equalizeSize(JButton[] aButtons)
Resizes the given buttons making them equal in size.

The sizes of the buttons are equalized only by enlarging their widths and heights (when necessary).

Parameters:
aButtons - Array of buttons to be made equal size.
Throws:
NullPointerException - If aButtons is null.

equalizeSize

public static void equalizeSize(JButton aButton1,
                                JButton aButton2)
Resizes the given buttons making them equal in size.

This a convenience method only. Calling this method is equivalent to calling:
equalizeSize(new JButton[] { aButton1, aButton2 });

Parameters:
aButton1 - First of the buttons to be made equal in size.
aButton2 - Second of the buttons to be made equal in size.
See Also:
equalizeSize(JButton[])

equalizeSize

public static void equalizeSize(JButton aButton1,
                                JButton aButton2,
                                JButton aButton3)
Resizes the given buttons making them equal in size.

This a convenience method only. Calling this method is equivalent to calling:
equalizeSize(new JButton[] { aButton1, aButton2, aButton3 });

Parameters:
aButton1 - First of the buttons to be made equal in size.
aButton2 - Second of the buttons to be made equal in size.
aButton3 - Third of the buttons to be made equal in size.
See Also:
equalizeSize(JButton[])

getSpinnerInt

public static int getSpinnerInt(JSpinner aSpinner)
Gets the currently selected integer value in a spinner control.

Parameters:
aSpinner - Spinner, whose chosen value is to be extracted.
Returns:
The selected value of the spinner rounded to integer.
Throws:
ClassCastException - If the spinner's model is not a SpinnerNumberModel.

invertOf

public static Color invertOf(Color aColor)
Gets the invert of the given color.

Parameters:
aColor - Color to get the invert of.
Returns:
New Color instance which stores the invert of aColor.

removeSelectedFile

public static void removeSelectedFile(JFileChooser aDialog)
Removes the selection from a file chooser in single selection mode.

Parameters:
aDialog - File selection dialog to be modified.

setSizes

public static void setSizes(JButton[] aButtons,
                            Dimension aPreferred,
                            Dimension aMax)
Sets the preferred and maximum sizes of the given buttons.

Parameters:
aButtons - Buttons to be modified.
aPreferred - Preferred size to be set to each of the buttons. If this is null, every button's preferred size is set to its default value.
aMax - Maximum size to be set to each of the buttons. If this is null, every button's maximum size is set to its default value.
Throws:
NullPointerException - If aButtons is null.

setStandardBorder

public static void setStandardBorder(JComponent aComponent)
Sets a standard border of the given component.

The standard border is an empty border of with BORDER_SIZE.

Parameters:
aComponent - Component to get a standard border. This component will lose its previous border, if any.

showErrorBox

public static void showErrorBox(String aTitle,
                                String aMessage)
Displays an error message dialog.

The owner of the dialog is set to be the Cytoscape desktop.

Parameters:
aTitle - Title of the dialog.
aMessage - Message to be displayed in the dialog.
See Also:
showErrorBox(Component, String, String)

showErrorBox

public static void showErrorBox(Component aParent,
                                String aTitle,
                                String aMessage)
Displays an error message dialog.

Parameters:
aParent - Owner of the dialog. Please note that the displayed dialog is modal.
aTitle - Title of the dialog.
aMessage - Message to be displayed in the dialog.

showInfoBox

public static void showInfoBox(String aTitle,
                               String aMessage)
Displays an information dialog.

The owner of the dialog is set to be the Cytoscape desktop.

Parameters:
aTitle - Title of the dialog.
aMessage - Message to be displayed in the dialog.
See Also:
showInfoBox(Component, String, String)

                               String aTitle,
                               String aMessage)
Displays an information dialog.

Parameters:
aParent - Owner of the dialog. Please note that the displayed dialog is modal.
aTitle - Title of the dialog.
aMessage - Message to be displayed in the dialog.
